Post.title: CentOS7Nginx
Post.description: Nginx(engine x) Igor Sysoev Web  IMAP/POP3/SMTP
Post._content:
# CentOS7Nginx

## 

Nginx  C  Linux  Windows  CentOS 7 

### gcc 
 nginx  gcc  gcc 

```shell
yum install gcc-c++
```

### PCRE pcre-devel 
PCRE(Perl Compatible Regular Expressions) Perl perl nginx  http  pcre  linux  pcre pcre-devel  pcre nginx

```shell
yum install -y pcre pcre-devel
```

### zlib 
zlib  nginx  zlib  http  gzip  Centos  zlib 

```shell
yum install -y zlib zlib-devel
```

### OpenSSL 
OpenSSL  SSL 
nginx  http  httpssslhttp Centos  OpenSSL 

```shell
yum install -y openssl openssl-devel
```



## 

1.  .tar.gz https://nginx.org/en/download.html

2.  wget wget `yum install wget` 

   ```shell
   wget -c https://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.18.0.tar.gz
   ```



## 

```shell
tar -zxvf nginx-1.18.0.tar.gz
cd nginx-1.18.0
```



## 

 nginx-1.18.0 

1.

```shell
./configure
```

2.

```shell
./configure \
--prefix=/usr/local/nginx \
--conf-path=/usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.conf \
--pid-path=/usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.pid \
--lock-path=/var/lock/nginx.lock \
--error-log-path=/var/log/nginx/error.log \
--http-log-path=/var/log/nginx/access.log \
--with-http_gzip_static_module \
--http-client-body-temp-path=/var/temp/nginx/client \
--http-proxy-temp-path=/var/temp/nginx/proxy \
--http-fastcgi-temp-path=/var/temp/nginx/fastcgi \
--http-uwsgi-temp-path=/var/temp/nginx/uwsgi \
--http-scgi-temp-path=/var/temp/nginx/scgi
```

> /var/temp/nginx/vartempnginx



## 
```shell
make
make install
```



```shell
whereis nginx
```



## nginx

```shell
cd /usr/local/nginx/sbin/
./nginx 
./nginx -s stop
./nginx -s quit
./nginx -s reload
```

> 80:
>
> nginx: [emerg] bind() to 0.0.0.0:80 failed (98: Address already in use)
>
> net-tool yum install net-tools
>
> ./nginx -s quit:nginx
>
> ./nginx -s stop:nginxidkill
>
> nginx`ps aux|grep nginx`



##  nginx

1. 
    nginx 

   ```shell
   ./nginx -s quit
   ./nginx
   ```

2. 
    ngin x nginx.conf  nginx `-s reload`  nginx nginx  nginx 

   ```shell
   ./nginx -s reload
   ```

Welcome to nginx!



## 
rc.local

```shell
vi /etc/rc.local
```

 `/usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx`


```shell
chmod 755 rc.local
```



nginx

##### prepare-commit-msg

prepare-commit-msg  pre-commit bugissueissueprepare-commit-msg

```python
#!/usr/bin/env python

import sys, os, re
from subprocess import check_output

# 
commit_msg_filepath = sys.argv[1]
if len(sys.argv) > 2:
    commit_type = sys.argv[2]
else:
    commit_type = ''
if len(sys.argv) > 3:
    commit_hash = sys.argv[3]
else:
    commit_hash = ''

print "prepare-commit-msg: File: %s\nType: %s\nHash: %s" % (commit_msg_filepath, commit_type, commit_hash)

# 
branch = check_output(['git', 'symbolic-ref', '--short', 'HEAD']).strip()
print "prepare-commit-msg: On branch '%s'" % branch

# issue
if branch.startswith('issue-'):
    print "prepare-commit-msg: Oh hey, it's an issue branch."
    result = re.match('issue-(.*)', branch)
    issue_number = result.group(1)

    with open(commit_msg_filepath, 'r+') as f:
        content = f.read()
        f.seek(0, 0)
        f.write("ISSUE-%s %s" % (issue_number, content))
```


##### commit-msg

commit-msgprepare-commit-msgprepare-commit-msgprepare-commit-msgISSUE-[#]

```python
#!/usr/bin/env python

import sys, os, re
from subprocess import check_output

# 
commit_msg_filepath = sys.argv[1]

# 
branch = check_output(['git', 'symbolic-ref', '--short', 'HEAD']).strip()
print "commit-msg: On branch '%s'" % branch

# issue
if branch.startswith('issue-'):
    print "commit-msg: Oh hey, it's an issue branch."
    result = re.match('issue-(.*)', branch)
    issue_number = result.group(1)
    required_message = "ISSUE-%s" % issue_number

    with open(commit_msg_filepath, 'r') as f:
        content = f.read()
        if not content.startswith(required_message):
            print "commit-msg: ERROR! The commit message must start with '%s'" % required_message
            sys.exit(1)
```

```sh
(1) How would you like to use ESLint?
To check syntax and find problems

JavaScript modules (import/export)

Vue.js

(4) Does your project use TypeScript?
Yes

(5) Where does your code run?
Browser

JavaScript

Yes

pnpm
```

```js
module.exports = {
```

- stylelint: csslint
- postcss: css
- postcss-less: less
- postcss-html: html/vue <style></style>

- stylelint-config-prettier: Prettier

.stylelintrc.js

```js
module.exports = {
  extends: [
    'stylelint-config-standard',
    'stylelint-config-prettier',
    'stylelint-config-recommended-less',
    'stylelint-config-standard-vue'
  ],
  plugins: ['stylelint-order'],
  // 
  overrides: [
    {
      files: ['**/*.(less|css|vue|html)'],
      customSyntax: 'postcss-less'
    },
    {
      files: ['**/*.(html|vue)'],
      customSyntax: 'postcss-html'
    }
  ],
  ignoreFiles: [
    '**/*.js',
    '**/*.jsx',
    '**/*.tsx',
    '**/*.ts',
    '**/*.json',
    '**/*.md',
    '**/*.yaml'
  ],
  rules: {
    'no-descending-specificity': null, // 
    'selector-pseudo-element-no-unknown': [
      true,
      {
        ignorePseudoElements: ['v-deep']
      }
    ],
    'selector-pseudo-class-no-unknown': [
      true,
      {
        ignorePseudoClasses: ['deep']
      }
    ],
    // 
    'order/properties-order': [
      'position',
      'top',
      'right',
      'bottom',
      'left',
      'z-index',
      'display',
      'justify-content',
      'align-items',
      'float',
      'clear',
      'overflow',
      'overflow-x',
      'overflow-y',
      'padding',
      'padding-top',
      'padding-right',
      'padding-bottom',
      'padding-left',
      'margin',
      'margin-top',
      'margin-right',
      'margin-bottom',
      'margin-left',
      'width',
      'min-width',
      'max-width',
      'height',
      'min-height',
      'max-height',
      'font-size',
      'font-family',
      'text-align',
      'text-justify',
      'text-indent',
      'text-overflow',
      'text-decoration',
      'white-space',
      'color',
      'background',
      'background-position',
      'background-repeat',
      'background-size',
      'background-color',
      'background-clip',
      'border',
      'border-style',
      'border-width',
      'border-color',
      'border-top-style',
      'border-top-width',
      'border-top-color',
      'border-right-style',
      'border-right-width',
      'border-right-color',
      'border-bottom-style',
      'border-bottom-width',
      'border-bottom-color',
      'border-left-style',
      'border-left-width',
      'border-left-color',
      'border-radius',
      'opacity',
      'filter',
      'list-style',
      'outline',
      'visibility',
      'box-shadow',
      'text-shadow',
      'resize',
      'transition'
    ]
  }
}
```

3. favicon.ico

4. syso


5. `go build -ldflags="-H windowsgui"` exeexe

```json
{
  "compilerOptions": {

    /*  */
    "target": "es5",                       //  ECMAScript : 'ES3' (default), 'ES5', 'ES6'/'ES2015', 'ES2016', 'ES2017', or 'ESNEXT'
    "module": "commonjs",                  // : 'commonjs', 'amd', 'system', 'umd' or 'es2015'
    "lib": [],                             // 
    "allowJs": true,                       //  javascript 
    "checkJs": true,                       //  javascript 
    "jsx": "preserve",                     //  jsx : 'preserve', 'react-native', or 'react'
    "declaration": true,                   //  '.d.ts' 
    "sourceMap": true,                     //  '.map' 
    "outFile": "./",                       // 
    "outDir": "./",                        // 
    "rootDir": "./",                       //  --outDir.
    "removeComments": true,                // 
    "noEmit": true,                        // 
    "importHelpers": true,                 //  tslib 
    "isolatedModules": true,               //   'ts.transpileModule' .

    /*  */
    "strict": true,                        // 
    "noImplicitAny": true,                 //  any
    "strictNullChecks": true,              //  null 
    "noImplicitThis": true,                //  this  any 
    "alwaysStrict": true,                  //  'use strict'

    /*  */
    "noUnusedLocals": true,                // 
    "noUnusedParameters": true,            // 
    "noImplicitReturns": true,             // 
    "noFallthroughCasesInSwitch": true,    //  switch  fallthrough  switch  case 

    /*  */
    "moduleResolution": "node",            //  'node' (Node.js) or 'classic' (TypeScript pre-1.6)
    "baseUrl": "./",                       // 
    "paths": {},                           //  baseUrl 
    "rootDirs": [],                        // 
    "typeRoots": [],                       // 
    "types": [],                           // 
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,  // 

    /* Source Map Options */
    "sourceRoot": "./",                    //  TypeScript 
    "mapRoot": "./",                       // 
    "inlineSourceMap": true,               //  soucemaps  sourcemaps 
    "inlineSources": true,                 //  sourcemaps  --inlineSourceMap  --sourceMap 

    /*  */
    "experimentalDecorators": true,        // 
    "emitDecoratorMetadata": true          // 
  }
}
```

Post.title: vuepress
Post._content:
#  vuepress 

## vuepress 

vuepress  Vue ****

+ ****/markdown

+ SEO

+ 

+ vue

+  github.pages**/**



## 

### 

1vuepress

```bash
npm install -g vuepress
```

2

```bash
npm init -y
```

3 [](https://vuepress.vuejs.org/zh/guide/directory-structure.html) 

```bash
# 
# 
 docs
    .vuepress  //
       components  //vue
       public  //
       styles  //
          palette.styl  //
       config.js   //
    pages   //markdown
    README.md   //markdown
 deploy.sh     //
 package.json  //
```

4

```json
"scripts": {
    "dev": "vuepress dev docs",         //
    "build": "vuepress build docs"      //
}
```



### 

#### 

 `config.js` 

```js
module.exports = {
    title: '', // title
    description: '', // meta SEO
    //  HTML <head> 
    head: [
        ['link', 
            { rel: 'icon', href: '/icon.png' }
            //'/'public
        ],  
    ],
}
```

 `docs/.vuepress/public` logo

 `npm run dev` `http://localhost:8080/` 

#### 

`README.md`

```markdown
---
home: true
heroImage: /icon.png
heroText: xxx
tagline: xxx
actionText:  
actionLink: /xxx
features:
- title: 
  details:  Markdown 
- title: Vue
  details:  Vue + webpack  Markdown  Vue  Vue 
- title: 
  details: VuePress  HTML SPA 
---
```

> heroImage'/' docs/.vuepress/public actionLink'/' docs/404

#### 

 `config.js` moudule.exports

```js
module.exports = {
    //...
    
    //md
    themeConfig: {
        logo: '/egg.png',  //
        
        //
        nav: [           
            //'/'
            { text: '', link: '/' },    
            
            //link
            {
                text: '',  //        
                ariaLabel: '',   //label
                items: [
                    { text: '', link: '/pages/folder1/test1.md' },  
                    //linkmarkdown
                    { text: '', link: '/pages/folder2/test4.md' },
                ]
            },
            { text: '', link: '/pages/folder1/test3.md' },
            
            //http/https
            { text: 'Github', link: 'https://github.com/dwanda' },
        ],
        
        ///
        sidebar: {
            '/pages/folder1/':[         
                {
                    title: '1',   // 
                    collapsable: false, // false, true,
                    sidebarDepth: 1,    //  markdown1h2
                    children: [
                        ['test1.md', '1'],  //'1'/pages/folder1/test1.md
                        ['test3.md', '2']
                    ]
                },
                {
                    title: '2',
                    collapsable: false, 
                    children: [
                        ['test2.md', '1']
                    ]
                }
            ],
            
            //...
        }
    }
}
```



## github page

 `deploy.sh` 

```shell
#!/usr/bin/env sh

# 
set -e

# 
npm run docs:build

# 
cd docs/.vuepress/dist

# 
# echo 'www.example.com' > CNAME

git init
git add -A
git commit -m 'deploy'

#  https://<USERNAME>.github.io
# git push -f git@github.com:<USERNAME>/<USERNAME>.github.io.git master

#  https://<USERNAME>.github.io/<REPO>
# git push -f git@github.com:<USERNAME>/<REPO>.git master:gh-pages

cd -
```

`package.json` shell

```json
"scripts": {
  "deploy": "bash deploy.sh"
}
```



## 

### 

Vuepress 1.x :

 package.json  

```json
"dev": "vuepress dev docs"
```



```json
"dev": "vuepress dev docs --temp .temp"
```



>  vuepress  .temp .gitignore 



## 

1. [VuePress](https://vuepress.vuejs.org/)
2. [1vuepress](https://juejin.cn/post/6844903999129436174#heading-9)
